Label: Respondent sequence number
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: General health condition
Comment: {First/Next} I have some general questions about {your/SP's} health.  Would you say {your/SP's} health in general is . . .
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION:  DISPLAY 'FIRST' IF SP AGE IS >= 16 YEARS.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Note: CHECK ITEM HUQ015: IF SP AGE >= 1, CONTINUE. OTHERWISE, GO TO HUQ030.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Health now compared with 1 year ago
Comment: Compared with 12 months ago, would you say {your/SP's} health is now . . .
Target: Both males and females 1 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Routine place to go for healthcare
Comment: Is there a place that {you/SP} usually {go/goes} when {you are/he/she is} sick or {you/s/he} need{s} advice about {your/his/her} health?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION:  IF SP AGE < 12, DISPLAY 'YOU' IN THE FOURTH DISPLAY AND DON'T DISPLAY THE 'S' IN THE FIFTH DISPLAY.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Type place most often go for healthcare
Comment: {What kind of place is it - a clinic, doctor's office, emergency room, or some other place?} {What kind of place {do you/does SP} go to most often - a clinic, doctor's office, emergency room, or some other place?}
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF HUQ.030 = 1 DISPLAY 'What kind of place is it - a clinic, doctor's office, emergency room, or some other place?' IF HUQ.030 = 3 DISPLAY 'What kind of place {do you/does SP} go to most often - a clinic, doctor's office, emergency room, or some other place?'
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: #times receive healthcare over past year
Comment: {During the past 12 months, how/How} many times {have you/has SP} seen a doctor or other health care professional about {your/his/her} health at a doctor's office, a clinic or some other place?  Do not include times {you were/s/he was} hospitalized overnight, visits to hospital emergency rooms, home visits or telephone calls.
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: DISPLAY '12 MONTHS' ONLY IF SP'S AGE IS >= 1.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: How long since last healthcare visit
Comment: About how long has it been since {you/SP} last saw or talked to a doctor or other health care professional about {your/his/her} health?  Include doctors seen while {you were} {he/she was} a patient in a hospital.  Has it been . . .
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Overnight hospital patient in last year
Comment: {During the past 12 months, were you/{was} SP} a patient in a hospital overnight?  Do not include an overnight stay in the emergency room.
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION:  DISPLAY '12 MONTHS' ONLY IF SP'S AGE IS >= 1.  DISPLAY 'WAS SP' WITH LEADING CAPS, IF SP'S AGE IS <1.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: #times overnite hospital patient/last yr
Comment: How many different times did {you/SP} stay in any hospital overnight or longer {during the past 12 months}? (Do not count total number of nights, just total number of hospital admissions for stays which lasted 1 or more nights.)
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: DISPLAY '12 MONTHS' ONLY IF SP'S AGE IS >= 1.  ENTER NUMBER.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Note: CHECK ITEM HUQ085:  IF SP AGE >= 4, CONTINUE.  OTHERWISE, GO TO END OF SECTION.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Seen mental health professional/past yr
Comment: During the past 12 months, that is since {DISPLAY CURRENT MONTH} of {DISPLAY LAST YEAR}, {have you/has SP} seen or talked to a mental health professional such as a psychologist, psychiatrist, psychiatric nurse or clinical social worker about {your/his/her} health?
Target: Both males and females 4 YEARS - 150 YEARS
